title: 1976-02-01 - WTTW SoundStage Chicago - Judy Collins invited Leonard Cohen to sing with her

part.reference: Hey, That's No Way To Say Goodbye

text: Judy Collins : And we'd like to sing together for you...
Leonard Cohen : this is a song that we first sing together in a Hotel room in Newport..
JC : That's right! That's right, the Festival it was...
LC : We sang it all night
